EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_10AM Spring Boot Authentication.Confirmation 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Spring Boot Authentication... and More!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Thank you for registering for our upcoming webinar Spring Boot Authentication... and More! on Thursday, February 18, 2016.
Please see event details below:
Date: Thursday, February 18, 2016 Time: 10:00AM PST
Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1133588/A3E4701A6A5ED66544A6EA8ED05DC960]]> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers. {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}}
We look forward to you joining us!
